specialAbilities.name: Keen Smell
specialAbilities.description: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

specialAbilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
